data.description: We're NT Concepts, a leading National Security solutions provider who is focused on staying in front of the digital edge with innovation and high value delivery. To help us stay in front of the digital edge, we have begun planning for our Summer 2026 Data Science Internship. Our technical team is on the lookout for self-starters with technical majors like physics, mathematics, data science, or data analytics. QUALIFICATIONS Who we are looking for: A rising junior or senior with a proven aptitude for our areas of passion will have the opportunity to complete a project that is sure to help their resumes stand out from the competition when it comes time to compete for full-time employment. Someone who has an interest in learning about solving problems for our government clients. The next generation of scientists and engineers who care deeply about national security and who want to be considered for a future government security clearance. Is this internship for you? If you are a patient and tenacious problem solver and are excited about growing your technical expertise to contribute to National Security, you should apply for this opportunity to work with our team. This internship will be based full-time on-site in Vienna, VA. As an intern, you will: Be part of a broader team that works on difficult problems in the National Security space Collaboratively design our products working with product management and visionaries in the company Participate in constructing and peer reviewing technical designs and architectural approaches Learn how to be part of a professional team By the end of the internship, you will: Experience new ways to communicate with team members and clients Obtain real world experience working with a team in an Agile/Scrum environment Have developed a solution for a real-world problem Your qualifications must include: A U.S. Citizen with the desire and ability to achieve a security clearance. While a security clearance is not required, preference will be given to potential interns who already possess a clearance. Experience in at least one software programming language, such as Python, Java, C# A positive attitude and willingness to work with the team to achieve departmental goals Effective communication, decision-making, and problem-solving skills Physical Requirements: Prolonged periods of sitting at a desk and working on a computer Must be able to lift 10-15 pounds at times. #JT About NT Concepts Founded in 1998 and headquartered in the Washington DC Metro area, NT Concepts is a private, mid-tier company with clients spanning the Intelligence and Defense communities. We deliver end-to-end ​data and technology solutions ​that advance the modernization, transformation, and automation of the national security mission—solutions with real impact developed in a strong engineering culture that encourages technical growth, leadership, and creative “big idea” problem-solving. Employees are the core of NT Concepts. We understand that world-changing concepts happen in collaborative environments. We are a company where talented teams work together using innovation and expertise to solve our clients’ most critical challenges. Here, you’ll gain competitive benefits, opportunities to bolster your skills and develop new abilities, and a company culture dedicated to support and service. In addition to our benefits program, we encourage our employees to take part in #NTC_GivesBack, which paves the way for positive social change. If joining a stable company with strong professional growth opportunities resonates with you, and you seek vital, mission-driven projects (for some pretty cool clients) that use your specific talents, we’d love to have you move forward with us.
requirements: Experience new ways to communicate with team members and clients
Obtain real world experience working with a team in an Agile/Scrum environment
Experience in at least one software programming language, such as Python, Java, C#
